'''''Drawings by Tolkien''''' is the catalogue of a [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] exhibition of the same name, held by Ashmolean Museum, Oxford, in [[1976]]-[[1977]]. The catalogue shows that 82 items were displayed on exhibition, but very few of them were reproduced in the booklet.<ref>[https://www.tolkienguide.com/modules/newbb/viewtopic.php?post_id=21554 Maker of Middle-earth Exhibition at The Bodleian - A Retrospective] on Tolkien Collector's Guide</ref>

It was also printed by The National Book League (ISBN 0853532516).
